salesforce_wsdl.label: WSDL File*
salesforce_wsdl.comment: Path to your WSDL file, relative to web root. Eg. lib/soapclient/enterprise.wsdl.xml

salesforce_client_type.label: Client Type
salesforce_client_type.comment: IMPORTANT: Salesforce WSDL type, please refer to your Salesforce manual.

check.label: Validate Salesforce Connection
check.comment: Click and validate Only after saving Salesforce credentials
check.tooltip: Please Validate Connection once all the Credential is saved

salesforce_license.label: License Key:
salesforce_license.comment: Validate your package with License key

check_license.label: Validate License
check_license.comment: Click and validate Only after saving Salesforce credentials
check_license.tooltip: Please Validate License once all the Credential is saved

salesforce_enable_disable_log.label: Enable Log
salesforce_enable_disable_log.comment: Magento Log has to be enabled for this to work.

opportunity_products.label: Opportunity Products
opportunity_products.comment:
Yes: Allows you to attach ordered items to Opportunity and Enables you to sync Magento products with Salesforce.
No: Opportunity in Salesforce will still be created but products wont be passing along.

default_pricebook.label: Default Pricebook
default_pricebook.comment: Default pricebook to be used with products.

salesforce_create_as_lead_enable.label: Create as Lead
salesforce_create_as_lead_enable.comment: Create a Lead first. When customer converting by placing an order. Convert to Contact an Account

salesforce_lead_enable.label: Synchronize Lead
salesforce_lead_enable.comment: Enable/Disable synchronization of Magento Contact Us.

salesforce_contact_lead_status.label: Lead Status
salesforce_contact_lead_status.comment: Lead status to be set in salesforce when Lead created.

salesforce_contact_lead_source.label: Lead Source
salesforce_contact_lead_source.comment: Lead source to be set in salesforce when Lead created.

salesforce_visitor_log_enable.label: Synchronize Visitor Log
salesforce_visitor_log_enable.comment: Enable/Disable synchronization of Magento Visitor Log.

salesforce_visitor_log_url_enable.label: Synchronize Visitor Log URL
salesforce_visitor_log_url_enable.comment: Enable/Disable synchronization of Magento Visitor Log URL.

salesforce_case_enable.label: Synchronize Ticket
salesforce_case_enable.tooltip: Case is created in salesforce when Ticket is created in Magento.

first_name.label: First Name:
first_name.tooltip: Please Select FirstName to Map Salesforce Leads FirstName

last_name.label: Last Name*:
last_name.tooltip: Please Select LastName to Map Salesforce Leads LastName

email.label: Email:
email.tooltip: Please Select Email to Map Salesforce Leads Email

telephone.label: Telephone:
telephone.tooltip: Please Select Phone to Map Salesforce Leads Phone

comment.label: Comment:
comment.tooltip: Please Select Description to Map Salesforce Leads Description

company.label: Company:
company.tooltip: Please Select Company to Map Salesforce Leads Company

account_name.label: Name*:
account_name.tooltip: Please Select Name to Map Salesforce Account Name

account_type.label: Type:
account_type.tooltip: Please Select Type to Map Salesforce Account Type

account_billingstreet.label: Billing Street:
account_billingstreet.tooltip: Please Select BillingStreet to Map Salesforce Account BillingStreet

account_billingcity.label: Billing City:
account_billingcity.tooltip: Please Select BillingCity to Map Salesforce Account BillingCity

account_billingregion.label: Billing State:
account_billingregion.tooltip: Please Select BillingState to Map Salesforce Account BillingState

account_billingcountry.label: Billing Country:
account_billingcountry.tooltip: Please Select BillingCountry to Map Salesforce Account BillingCountry

account_billing_postal.label: ZipPostal Code:
account_billing_postal.tooltip: Please Select BillingPostalCode to Map Salesforce Account BillingPostalCode

account_shippingstreet.label: Shipping Street:
account_shippingstreet.tooltip: Please Select ShippingStreet to Map Salesforce Account ShippingStreet

account_shippingcity.label: Shipping City:
account_shippingcity.tooltip: Please Select ShippingCity to Map Salesforce Account ShippingCity

account_shippingstate.label: Shipping State:
account_shippingstate.tooltip: Please Select ShippingState to Map Salesforce Account ShippingState

account_shippingcountry.label: Shipping Country:
account_shippingcountry.tooltip: Please Select ShippingCountry to Map Salesforce Account ShippingCountry

account_shippingpostal.label: ZipPostal Code:
account_shippingpostal.tooltip: Please Select ShippingPostalCode to Map Salesforce Account ShippingPostalCode

account_shippingphone.label: Phone:
account_shippingphone.tooltip: Please Select Phone to Map Salesforce Account Phone

salesforce_contacts_first_name.label: First Name*:
salesforce_contacts_first_name.tooltip: Please Select FirstName to Map Salesforce Contact FirstName

salesforce_contacts_last_name.label: Last Name*:
salesforce_contacts_last_name.tooltip: Please Select LastName to Map Salesforce Contact LastName

salesforce_contacts_email.label: Email:
salesforce_contacts_email.tooltip: Please Select Email to Map Salesforce Contact Email

salesforce_contacts_phone.label: Phone:
salesforce_contacts_phone.tooltip: Please Select HomePhone to Map Salesforce Contact HomePhone

salesforce_product_name.label: Name
salesforce_product_name.tooltip: Please Select Name to Map Salesforce Product2 Name

salesforce_product_model.label: Product Model
salesforce_product_model.tooltip: Please Select ProductCode to Map Salesforce Product2 ProductCode

salesforce_product_description.label: Description
salesforce_product_description.tooltip: Please Select Description to Map Salesforce Product2 Description

salesforce_product_short_description.label: Short Description
salesforce_product_short_description.tooltip: Please Select Short Description to Map Salesforce Product2 Short Description

salesforce_product_type.label: Product Type
salesforce_product_type.tooltip: Please Select Family to Map Salesforce Product2 Family

salesforce_product_weight.label: Weight
salesforce_product_weight.comment: Select Salesforce Product2 Field 'ForceGento__Weight__c', Note its a custom attribute created in salesforce
salesforce_product_weight.tooltip: Please Select ForceGento__Weight__c to Map Salesforce Product2 ForceGento__Weight__c

salesforce_product_tax_class.label: Tax Class
salesforce_product_tax_class.comment: Select Salesforce Product2 Field 'ForceGento__Tax_Class__c', Note its a custom attribute created in salesforce
salesforce_product_tax_class.tooltip: Please Select ForceGento__Tax_Class__c to Map Salesforce Product2 ForceGento__Tax_Class__c

salesforce_product_active.label: Active
salesforce_product_active.tooltip: Please Select IsActive to Map Salesforce Product2 IsActive

salesforce_product_backorder.label: Backorder
salesforce_product_backorder.tooltip: Please Select Backorder to Map Salesforce Product2 Backorder

salesforce_product_qty.label: Quantity
salesforce_product_qty.comment: Select Salesforce Product Field 'Quantity_c', Note its a custom attribute created in salesforce
salesforce_product_qty.tooltip: Please Select Quantity_c to Map Salesforce Product Quantity_c

salesforce_product_stock_availability.label: Stock Availability
salesforce_product_stock_availability.comment: Select Salesforce Product Field 'ForceGento__Stock_Availability__c', Note its a custom attribute created in salesforce
salesforce_product_stock_availability.tooltip: Please Select ForceGento__Stock_Availability__c to Map Salesforce Product ForceGento__Stock_Availability__c

salesforce_pricebook_entry_price.label: Price
salesforce_pricebook_entry_price.tooltip: Please Select UnitPrice to Map Salesforce PricebookEntry UnitPrice

salesforce_pricebook_entry_active.label: Active
salesforce_pricebook_entry_active.tooltip: Please Select IsActive to Map Salesforce PricebookEntry IsActive

salesforce_opportunity_name.label: Name:
salesforce_opportunity_name.tooltip: Please Select Name to Map Salesforce Opportunity Name

status.label: Status:
status.tooltip: Please Select StageName to Map Salesforce Opportunity StageName

amount.label: Amount:
amount.tooltip: Please Select Amount to Map Salesforce Opportunity Amount

opportunityquantity.label: Total Qty:
opportunityquantity.tooltip: Please Select TotalOpportunityQuantity to Map Salesforce Opportunity TotalOpportunityQuantity

leadsource.label: Web:
leadsource.tooltip: Please Select LeadSource to Map Salesforce Opportunity LeadSource

date.label: Close date:
date.tooltip: Please Select CloseDate to Map Salesforce Opportunity CloseDate

ordernumber.label: Order Number:
ordernumber.tooltip: Please Select ForceGento__OrderNumber__c to Map Salesforce Opportunity ForceGento__OrderNumber__c

mapping_to_salesforce_opportunity_line_i.label: Order Product Mapping to Salesforce OpportunityLineItem

salesforce_opportunity_line_item_qty.label: Quantity:
salesforce_opportunity_line_item_qty.tooltip: Please Select Quantity to Map Salesforce OpportunityLineItem Quantity

salesforce_opportunity_line_item_total_p.label: Total Price:
salesforce_opportunity_line_item_total_p.tooltip: Please Select TotalPrice to Map Salesforce OpportunityLineItem TotalPrice

salesforce_opportunity_line_item_service.label: Service Date:
salesforce_opportunity_line_item_service.tooltip: Please Select ServiceDate to Map Salesforce OpportunityLineItem ServiceDate
